titleStmt.title: An antidote against Mr. Baxters palliated cure of church divisions, or, An account of several weighty and just exceptions against that book
titleStmt.author: Bagshaw, Edward, 1629-1671.

notesStmt.note: Written by Edward Bagshaw. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
